thread.section_title: Hotel Diocleziano - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Hotel!
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel! - Review of Hotel Diocleziano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Liz H
title: Excellent Hotel!
text:
Hotel Diocleziano is in an excellent location, just a few minutes walk from termini station, we found it easy to get everywhere (mostly on foot). Hospitality is great- all of the staff we met were lovely and very helpful. The breakfast is excellent and the hostess is very well organised and speaks great English.
We had a great time there and would visit again.
